  • Method Details

    • get

      public static LogInspector get()

    • getLogHistory

      public List<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent> getLogHistory(@Nullable @Nullable Class<?> source, boolean onlyThrowing, ch.qos.logback.classic.Level level, boolean includeHigherLevels)
      Gets a filtered list of logging events that have been recorded.
      Parameters:
      source - The class the logging events were logged from. This may be null to process all logging events regardless of their originating class.
      onlyThrowing - True to only look for logging events where a throwable was thrown.
      level - The cutoff level. All logging events under this level will be filtered out.
      includeHigherLevels - Whether to include levels above the provided level in the search. When this is true, errors logged at, for example, Level.ERROR will also be included in the search when the provided level is Level.INFO.
      Returns:
      The filtered list of logging events.

    • getThrowingHistory

      public List<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent> getThrowingHistory(@Nullable @Nullable Class<?> source)
      Gets all logging events that contained a throwable and were logged with any log level.

      Gets all logging events that contained a throwable and were logged with any log level.

      Returns:
      The list of all recorded logging events.

    • getLogCount

      public int getLogCount(@Nullable @Nullable Class<?> source, boolean onlyThrowing, ch.qos.logback.classic.Level level, boolean includeHigherLevels)
      Gets the number of entries in the log history that match the provided description.
      Parameters:
      source - The class the logging events were logged from. This may be null to process all logging events regardless of their originating class.
      onlyThrowing - True to only look for logging events where a throwable was thrown.
      level - The cutoff level. All logging events under this level will be filtered out.
      includeHigherLevels - Whether to include levels above the provided level in the search. When this is true, errors logged at, for example, Level.ERROR will also be included in the search when the provided level is Level.INFO.
      Returns:
      The number of entries in the log history that match the provided parameters.

    • getLogCount

      public int getLogCount(@Nullable @Nullable Class<?> source)
      Gets the total number of entries in the log event history.
      Parameters:
      source - The class the logging events were logged from.

      Gets the number of logging events that contained a throwable and were logged with at least Level.ERROR level.

    • getLastThrowable

      public Optional<Throwable> getLastThrowable(@Nullable @Nullable Class<?> source, ch.qos.logback.classic.Level level, boolean includeHigherLevels)
      Gets the most recent entry in the logging event history that contained a throwable.
      Parameters:
      source - The class the logging events were logged from. This may be null to process all logging events regardless of their originating class.
      level - The cutoff level. All logging events under this level will be filtered out.
      includeHigherLevels - Whether to include levels above the provided level in the search. When this is true, errors logged at, for example, Level.ERROR will also be included in the search when the provided level is Level.INFO.
      Returns:
      The most recent entry in the logging event history that contained a throwable.
